mapper.insert: INSERT INTO W_WILLOW ( sender_no, receiver_no, created_at, state ) VALUES ( #{sender_no}, #{receiver_no}, sysdate(), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT CAST(W_WILLOW.receiver_no AS CHAR) AS receiver_no, DATE_FORMAT(W_WILLOW.created_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, W_WILLOW.state AS state, M_USER.id AS receiver_id, M_USER.school AS receiver_school, M_USER.gender AS receiver_gender FROM W_WILLOW INNER JOIN M_USER ON W_WILLOW.receiver_no = M_USER.seq WHERE W_WILLOW.sender_no = #{userId}

mapper.update: UPDATE W_WILLOW SET state = 'Y' WHERE sender_no = #{sender_no} AND receiver_no = #{receiver_no}
